{"id":1238693498,"question_id":932,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713754237,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1238693498/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"59.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isMonotonic(int[] nums) {\n        boolean increasing = true;\n        boolean decreasing = true;\n\n        // Check if the array is monotone increasing\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] < nums[i - 1]) {\n                increasing = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // Check if the array is monotone decreasing\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] > nums[i - 1]) {\n                decreasing = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // If either increasing or decreasing is true, return true\n        return increasing || decreasing;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
